meta.title: The Open House â€“ A Bedtime Story
meta.body:
This photo essay documents an event that occurred in the Porter Bridge Gallery at UC Santa Cruz in April 2006. For ten days, the gallery was transformed into a creative living space. The highlight of this event was a family of five who lived at the space for the entire duration. The Open House was a project produced by Jamie Burkart.
For more information, please see the full description (pdf).
